item.title: The Week Ahead: Jan. 15 - 19, 2024 | Washington State House Republicans
item.description: News article "The Week Ahead: Jan. 15 - 19, 2024 | Washington State House Republicans" from House Republicans.

item.title: 👍💵Adam Zarrin - Leukemia & Lymphoma Society
item.description: Adam Zarrin signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Leukemia & Lymphoma Society. They are a registered lobbyist.
